attributes.action: Award Ruthie Henshall an honour for services to musical theatre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ruthie Henshall has been a star of musical theatre for over 20 years and is one of the most talented actresses/singers and dancers that we have, she deserves to be recognised for her commitment, professsionalism and dedication to the world of theatre.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
